website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-XS1 earns points for its amazingly slim design and low cost, but it's not the best pocket camera out there.

customer_reviews.title: Your cell phone's camera is probably better
customer_reviews.text: The only good reason to consider this camera if you already carry a cell phone with a half-way decent camera is for the XS1's 5X zoom lens. A high-end 2018 iPhone or Android phone's camera will produce better quality photos, especially at low light levels. Since this camera was already out of production when I purchased mine in December 2015, the non-removable battery will be suspect. Mine bleeds away its charge in a month or two on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: PhotonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Bought this refurbished but it really was as good as new
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refurbished but it really was as good as new, apart from the packaging which was not original of course. Camera performs okay, it's not the greatest but not surprising as it is all crammed in such a small package. Overall great for parties and anywhere where you want to be able to stuff a camera in your pocket and not worrying about it. Better than my phone camera, but not as good as a full-size compact camera.
customer_reviews.author: Br@S1L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic truly 'pocketable' camera.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously there is going to be a bit of trade-off when it comes to compact cameras. The great advantage with this camera is that it will truly fit into your pocket comfortably (even with fairly tight pants on), it has a nice alloy build, it looks great, and it takes reasonably good pictures. For what it is (you wouldn't expect DSLR quality images from this camera), it is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: treehouse

customer_reviews.title: small and full featured
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement for an older model that accidentally went into a lake. Its very easy to use and the pictures are very nice. It uses a micro sd chip instead of a full sized one which is not as convenient as another piece of equipment is needed in order to get pictures uploaded
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix XS1 compact digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I selected this economically-priced point and shoot to replace a similar Canon SureShot that jammed presumably due to an electronic failure after only a few uses--but after the warranty had expired. So far I'm happy with the Panasonic. It's easy to take in my pocket and easy to use. I do have other larger digitals with stronger zooms that I use for certain purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki P

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift and our daughter loves it. Not larger than an iPhone so she can carry it all of the time and use it quickly. Lot's of functions for the beginner or the weekend shooter. As always I can trust the Lumix to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: This camera met all my expectations--simple to use, extremely lightweight and compact, and fairly high-quality images, at least to my untrained eye. It's gotten compliments when I've asked strangers to take a picture (not that that should be a high priority when choosing a camera). I haven't had any difficulty using the buttons, though they are pretty tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Panasonic pocket cameras and I was impressed by them all. This one is great too. Small, compact, that can take good pictures anywhere you are.
customer_reviews.author: JCinTN

customer_reviews.title: So far, a great little camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Camera was a purchased for a person with zero experience in photography. Set camera to it's auto mode and away she went, taking hundreds of photos. Could not be happier with the results! Every photo, no matter the conditions, has come perfectly exposed and focused. Camera will likely never be used to its full potential with all its modes and features, it's doing exactly what it was purchased for. Great little camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was great, but had to return because the camera stopped saving pictures and would freeze up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: amazing little camera, very easy and simple to use. decently priced as well, if all you need is a good quality picture this is a good pick
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Design doesn't outweigh quality
customer_reviews.text: The design is great. Buttons a little small as mentioned in other reviews, but I wouldn't have returned it for just that. I thought for 16 MP I might be getting a decent point and shoot, and I have other Panasonic cameras that are great. But unfortunately the quality really wasn't there, and I would have to compare the results to a 5 megapixel cheaper camera. I don't know how it compares to other point and shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Garbo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong handing this to someone as a gift. Small enough to carry anywhere and yet it has so many functions. Great all purpose camera.
customer_reviews.author: FlGatorsGuy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new camera from Panasonic. It is so portable, and practical, and the best part is that it takes superb pictures.
customer_reviews.author: JE of HNL

customer_reviews.title: it is good looking
customer_reviews.text: Looking is good. I bought the white one. It is very small like a mobile phone,just a little thicker. The image is not good although it has wide angle function (to 25mm). If you take picture in the night, you can not get good image. So I give the 3-star meaning it is small and beautiful but you can not get the good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zhiyi Guo

customer_reviews.title: Very slow shutter
customer_reviews.text: Four seconds lag for the photo to be recorded following the shutter release. Extremely enervating. One of the few Panasonic products that did not meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Small and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The best camera ever. Good quality pictures and easy to use. Looks good too. I love this camera very much!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Thin dependable and great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Camera fits in a shirt pocket. Great, clear zoom. This review requires me to add these last few words. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This was an extra camera for us we have a really good one. this was a quick small one we got for day trips not bad not great
customer_reviews.author: spandex wife

customer_reviews.title: instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions for deleting pix were not easy to understand. Those are my thoughts and they do not need to be any longer
customer_reviews.author: Angelo George

customer_reviews.title: Nice photos
customer_reviews.text: Bought for recent European trip. Takes great pictures, but the shutter has a very long lag time. You won't be able to rapid fire shots, but it does take a nice picture. Very slim and easy to fit in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix XS1 16.1 MP Compact Digital Camera with 8x Intelligent Zoom (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteFROM THE MANUFACTURER



 PANASONIC LUMIX DMC-XS1W RAZOR THIN POCKET-ABLE COMPACT POINT AND SHOOT DIGITAL CAMERA, 5X WIDE-ANGLE ZOOM/8X INTELLIGENT ZOOM, 13 IN-CAMERA CREATIVE EFFECTS, HD VIDEO, OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZER - WHITE

 RAZOR THIN POCKET-ABLE CAMERA
The razor thin Panasonic DMC-XS1 compact digital camera is small enough to fit in your pocket, with creative controls to personalize your pictures. (Click to Learn More) The DMC-XS1 digital camera boasts the world's slimmest body profile, for a digital camera with optical 5x retractable zoom lens and Optical Image Stabilizer as of January 7, 2013, thanks to Panasonic's advanced optical design and development technology. Photo and video data are recorded in ultra-small microSD/SDHC Memory Cards, the same cards accepted by most major smartphones. Achieve high quality pictures and video from a super slim stylish camera with a 5x optical zoom and 24mm ultra wide-angle lens. Enjoy the versatility of shooting near and far making it great for travel.

 5X WIDE-ANGLE OPTICALLY STABILIZED ZOOM/8X INTELLIGENT ZOOM
The Panasonic LUMIX DMC-XS1 digital camera delivers high quality wide-angle pictures to detailed close-ups with the 5x Optical Zoom and 8X Intelligent Zoom. (Click to Learn More) Bring your subject in closer to capture the action of sports or nature photography, or a beautiful portrait with the Panasonic XS1's powerful 5x zoom. When you need to get even closer to your subject, the Intelligent Zoom is an extensive zoom function that uses digital zoom technology with minimum deterioration of image quality. The 5x optical zoom can virtually extend to an incredible 8x zoom equivalent (35mm camera equivalent: 192mm).

 CREATE AMAZING PHOTOS WITH 13 IN-CAMERA CREATIVE EFFECTS
The Panasonic XS1 compact digital camera takes the guesswork out of photography with 13 in-camera effects. Take simple or complicated scenes and make them easy to capture in amazing photos. (Click To Learn More) Panasonic is ready to take the ordinary and make it extraordinary by fueling your creativity with the in-camera Creative Control feature (in the recording mode) and the Creative Retouch feature (in the playback mode). These features take simple or complicated scenes and make them easy to capture in a great photo. Simply set the camera to match your scene and it uses sophisticated presets to optimize the camera settings resulting in photos you'll be proud of.

 INSTANTLY CAPTURE HD VIDEO WITH A DEDICATED VIDEO BUTTON
The XS1 point and shot digital camera delivers HD video along with high quality still images so you'll never miss a moment. Easily switch between photo and video shooting instantly. (Click to Learn More) Jump into the word of movie making with the press of a button. The Panasonic LUMIX DMC-XS1 compact camera records HD video in Motion JPEG format (1,280 x 720 pixels at 30 fps). Video recording can be easily started with the press of the Motion Picture Button making it convenient for switching between photo and video shooting instantly. In Motion Picture Mode, recording time depends on the capacity of the SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card. Video can be recorded continuously up to 2GB. Use a card with SD Speed Class, the speed standard regarding continuous writing, with "Class 6" or higher for best results. Some lens movement sounds may be recorded when shooting video.

 24MM ULTRA WIDE-ANGLE LENS
The Panasonic LUMIX XS1 delivers high quality ultra wide-angle pictures from expansive landscapes to environmental portraits. (Click To Learn More) The DMC-XS1 camera packs a 24mm ultra wide-angle lens with 5x optical zoom (35mm camera equivalent: 24-120mm) into a slim, compact body for the ultimate shooting experience. The convenience of a pocket-able camera with the power of a 24mm lens gives you a wider range of composition possibilities with approximately 213% larger viewing space compared to that of a 35mm camera.

 SUPER SHARP PHOTOS WITH MEGA O.I.S. OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZER
Confidently shoot in lower light scenarios you may have stayed away from in the past with the Mega Optical Image Stabilizer. (Click To Learn More)  The Panasonic's MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) compensates for hand-shake that causes blurred photos. Even slight hand-shake movement is accurately detected and compensated for to produce sharp, clear images even in tricky lighting conditions. Bring on the night portraits or scenes, shoot in dimly lit rooms, and even hand-hold a macro shot with confidence that the MEGA O.I.S. will keep your pictures sharp.

 IA (INTELLIGENT AUTO) MODE TAKES THE GUESSWORK OUT OF PHOTOGRAPHY
Take your photography to the next level with the Panasonic's XS1's iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode. Simply aim, press, and shoot while the camera goes to work to give you beautiful photos and videos. (Click To Learn More)  With the Panasonic DMC-XS1 digital camera behind you, your photography will soar to new levels with state-of-the-art features and technologies like the iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode. The digital camera does the technical setting work, leaving you free to compose your shot and capture the moment. Simply aim, press, and shoot. The detection and correction functions go to work to give you beautiful photos and videos. Keep in mind the iA Mode functions vary with photos and videos.

 RECHARGE ON THE GO FROM A USB PORT OR AC USB ADAPTER
The efficient, rechargeable lithium-ion battery lets you take approximately 260 shots on a single battery charge, based on the CIPA standard. (Click to View Larger) You'll always be ready for the next shot with the convenience of recharging on the go. The Panasonic DMC-XS1 will charge in a USB Port or with the AC USB Adapter keeping you powered up and shooting. Take approximately 260 shots on a single battery charge, based on the CIPA standard, with the efficient, rechargeable lithium-ion battery.

 PREMIUM ACCESSORIES FOR THE PANASONIC LUMIX DMC-XS1
32GB SDHC Memory Card
Panasonic 32GB SDHC Memory Card with Class 10 Speed Performance 8GB SD Memory Card
Panasonic 8GB SD Memory Card with SD Speed Class 4 Performance AV Cable
AV Cable for select LUMIX Digital Cameras USB Connection Cable DMW-USBC1
USB rewind type cable, maximum cable length 1.5m 
 STYLISH ZOOM COMPARISON CHART
